name: PeopleSoft: FIELDNUM values should be numbered sequentially for Record
associatedValueName: Either 'FIELDNUM not sequential = <FIELDNUM value>' or 'Same FIELDNUM = <FIELDNUM value>'
description:
The PSRECFIELD.FIELDNUM values should be numbered sequentially from 1 through PSRECDEFN.FIELDCOUNT.
Note: when using Application Designer, it is not possible to generate errors
output:
This report lists all Record fields with a bad FIELDNUM:
- No field with FIELDNUM - 1
- Another field with the same FIELDNUM
rationale: As PeopleSoft uses FIELDNUM to generate the SQL script to create the record, it should be correctly defined
